title: Important Update
text: Please note that we have updated our terms of service. Click here to review the changes.

title: Meeting Reminder
text: Just a friendly reminder that we have a team meeting tomorrow at 10:00 AM. See you there!

title: New Product Launch
text: We're excited to announce the launch of our new product line! Check out our website for more details.

title: Server Maintenance
text: We will be performing server maintenance tonight from 10:00 PM to 2:00 AM. Expect some downtime during this period.

title: Holiday Schedule
text: Our office will be closed on Monday, September 5th in observance of Labor Day. We will resume normal business hours on Tuesday.

title: Product Recall
text: We are recalling a batch of our product due to a manufacturing defect. Please refer to our website for more information.

title: Employee Appreciation Day
text: We would like to extend our appreciation to all of our hardworking employees on this special day. Thank you for all that you do!

title: System Upgrade
text: We will be upgrading our systems on Wednesday, September 20th. Expect some service interruptions during this time.

title: Charity Drive
text: We're kicking off our annual charity drive! Help us make a difference in the lives of those in need by donating today.

title: Product Discount
text: Get 20% off on all products this weekend only! Don't miss out on this special offer.
